nodes.text: The Meryx was a Gozanti-class cruiser owned by the gemstone thief Pax Maripher and co-piloted by Rahara Wick around 40 BBY. Before their partnership, Maripher went through several pilots, who could not stand his quirks.
Maripher modified the systems, and also installed a custom scanner-blocking field. The Facet, a small starfighter, was stored in the lower cargo hold.
The Meryx appears in the 2019 novel Master & Apprentice, written by Claudia Gray.
